task.summary: Default task
creating a better listView added ability to view zones and when long press it takes you to the location of the stop
Calculating distance from current location sorting based on distance scraping the bus routes for each bus stop refactoring GeoUtility code.
ability to disable bus scraping data. and if scraping limit to 5..(otherwise it does hang a lot!) provided consistent gps location updates
decorating always before everything
extended the DB to be full for timetables incl bus routes, trips,stops removed scraping tasks refactored db calls to an async task
fixing nullPointerBug when bus route not found on the thursday timetable tables
preparing for searching for bus stop for a bus route
Added new activity for searching for bus routes on a 500 m radius - styled the activity to be a flow activity - styled buttons.
showing toast properly and removing where not needed
showing toast properly and removing where not needed
Added BugSense for bug reporting and bit of analytics
Added BugSense for bug reporting and bit of analytics
added maps but need to refactor code
using dialog to catch errors and proper way of using markers in maps
added map to Nearest Stops activity.
using getContent on StopInfoWindowAdapter
using getContent on StopInfoWindowAdapter
integrated here there now with auto complete text view for suburb
integrated here there now with auto complete text view for suburb
refactor BusRoute to be an object for bus routes display map of location of bus stops for bus routes
sending to market if no play services!
dispalying more information on the allBusrouteActivityMap marker and making them clickable
you can search bus route on any bus now
you can search bus route on any bus now
fix UI style change name of the app using proper maps certificate
UI should hopefully now cater for low res devices using adMob now and few bug fixes
using proper Fragments using backbutton on action bar

MESSAGE.value: creating a better listView added ability to view zones and when long press it takes you to the location of the stop
Calculating distance from current location sorting based on distance scraping the bus routes for each bus stop refactoring GeoUtility code.
ability to disable bus scraping data. and if scraping limit to 5..(otherwise it does hang a lot!) provided consistent gps location updates
decorating always before everything
extended the DB to be full for timetables incl bus routes, trips,stops removed scraping tasks refactored db calls to an async task
fixing nullPointerBug when bus route not found on the thursday timetable tables
preparing for searching for bus stop for a bus route
Added new activity for searching for bus routes on a 500 m radius - styled the activity to be a flow activity - styled buttons.
showing toast properly and removing where not needed
Added BugSense for bug reporting and bit of analytics
added maps but need to refactor code
using dialog to catch errors and proper way of using markers in maps
added map to Nearest Stops activity.
using getContent on StopInfoWindowAdapter
integrated here there now with auto complete text view for suburb
refactor BusRoute to be an object for bus routes display map of location of bus stops for bus routes
sending to market if no play services!
dispalying more information on the allBusrouteActivityMap marker and making them clickable
you can search bus route on any bus now
fix UI style change name of the app using proper maps certificate
UI should hopefully now cater for low res devices using adMob now and few bug fixes
using proper Fragments using backbutton on action bar
